citation.article-title: Haladaptatus cibarius sp. nov., an extremely halophilic archaeon from seafood, and emended description of the genus Haladaptatus
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Emended description of the genus Haladaptatus Savage et al. 2007
The description is based on that given by Savage et al. (2007), with the following amendments.
Cells contain PG, PGP-Me and two unidentified glycolipids.
The presence of PGS is variable.
The DNA G+C content is 56.5–60.5 mol%.
